description: Park Canada agency wishes to obtain the service of a Contractor to carry out the complete replacement of several end treatments located along the parkway of La Mauricie National Park.",
full_summary:
### Replacement of Guardrail End Devices, La Mauricie National Park

**Tender Reference:** PW-23-01029494
**Procurement Number:** 5P468-23-0011/A
**Publication Date:** 2023-03-17
**Closure Date:** 2023-04-04 14:00:00

**Project Overview:**
The Parks Canada Agency invites contractors to bid on a project to replace guardrail end devices located along the parkway of La Mauricie National Park.

**Contract Specifications:**
- Estimated project value: $100,001 to $250,000
- Completion date: May 12, 2023
- Security requirement: None
- Site visit: Not applicable
- Tender documents can be downloaded from the Government of Canada tendering service at [www.canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities](http://www.canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities).

**Submission Instructions:**

- Bids must be submitted via fax or email to [soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca](mailto:soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca)
- Facsimiles can be sent to 1-855-983-1808
- Emails with attachments must not exceed 15 megabytes
- Please ensure that bids are submitted in complete, properly labeled emails (ex. 1 of 2)

**Important Notes:**

- Documents may be submitted in either official language (English or French)
- Late submissions will not be considered
- The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement
- Enquiries regarding this solicitation must be submitted in writing and should be received no later than five (5) business days prior to the date set for solicitation closing.

**Contracting Entity:**
Parks Canada Agency
30 Victoria Street, Gatineau, QC J8X 0B3
[Christine.Piche@pc.gc.ca](mailto:Christine.Piche@pc.gc.ca)
873-355-8841
1-855-983-1808

I took note of the following items to prepare your response:
- Provided more concise and clear headings
- Changed lower-case typography to title case or upper-case typography for emphasis
- Standardized contact information in the English and French language
- Omitted unnecessary text
- Retained all the relevant details 
- Etc.  Let me know if I should add or change anything
